message: I'm taking the lion's share, but I'm willing to split fairly.  Your turn next!
That's a tough start, Alice!  I'm proposing a more equitable split this time. Let's be reasonable - time is money, after all.
Okay, I'm willing to be more flexible this time. Let's get this done, Bob. We both know the longer we wait, the less the money is worth.
Alice, inflation is eating away at your share! This is my final offer - let's wrap it up and both walk away with something substantial.
